name: Legend of Wuxia - 3D MMORPG
description:
Start Your Martial World!
Classic eastern Wuxia masterpiece, customize lifestyle of your own.

【Real-time Cross-server Battle】
Skillful pick and roll to PVP, Real-time cross-server battle with muti-players.
Experience the game with great freedom and go beyond the battle with excitement and pleasure!

【Make by Unreal Engine 4】
3D picturesque wonderland, splendid Kongfu representation with special effects,
handreds of customized fashion, all comes from experienced designers.
Have fun with excellent dungeons, get a heap of materials, collect thousands of supreme Titles, Achievements, free Jades and so on.

【Brief if life, but love is long】
Traditional Chinese wedding ceremony, flower sedan,Bridal chamber, Couple Dungeons and
Couple VS Couple Bettle and so on, a true love may happen on game....

【BE KING BY GORGEOUS RIDE】
Different kinds of ride increase combat power!
Fantasy Pegasus, Christmas Reindeer,Phoenix Dragon and so on!
Get your costomized ride in game!
